title: Game Progress Route
content:
:

[WISDOM] Probe his thoughts for more information. What does he want with her? Sounds like fun - I’m with you. I’m not like you - I don’t take orders from the Absolute’s cronies. Touch her and I’ll kill you.

Choosing the first option and passing the Wisdom check will allow you to see Ketheric give the order to Marcus. Isobel will question your telepathic interaction, to which you’ll have the following options to respond with:

Marcus is trying to kidnap you, Isobel. We’re going to need to fig
